articles.title: University of Manitoba teaming up with researchers in Africa to study mpox - iHeartRadio.ca

articles.title: No new lockdown for SA after XBB.1.5 subvariant detecte... - Daily Maverick
articles.description: There will be no new lockdown or travel restrictions in South Africa after University of Stellenbosch scientists found a case of the XBB.1.5 Omicron subvariant in South Africa, Minister of Health, Dr Joe Phaahla, said during a press conference on Tuesday.
articles.content:
South Africa will step up testing and monitoring wastewater for particles of the Sars-COV-2 virus in response to the discovery of the XBB1.5 subvariant in the country.
